name: We are visionaries
description:
School in Jalandhar


Teaching is not a profession; it's a responsibility to develop a small kid into a full-fledged highly responsible citizen. And being a leading School in Jalandhar we understand our responsibilities very well and work 24/7 to fulfill them. When you enroll your kid in LBS then you don't have to bother about any of his activities because we will take care of everything and ensure that he will get optimum success in whichever field he wants. If your kid is interested in sports then we will have the optimum infrastructure for that, we have a basketball court, cricket ground, tennis court, and facilities for other indoor sports as well.
